entry.title: UAsset Modding
entry.summary: UAsset Modding To do UAsset modding, you’ll need to be able to extract the raw files from the game. Make sure to use this .bat file in your UE4 install directory to unpack the game files: @if "%~1"=="" goto skip @setlocal enableextensions @pushd %~dp0 .\UnrealPak.exe %1 -extract "%~n1" @popd @pause :skip Numerical/String Edits These are by far the easiest edits to do.
